unnormalised: Hey! Enjoying these athlete biographies. Always inspiring to read about folks like Mithali Raj & her journey. Remember "Chak De! India"? Similar spirit. It's fascinating how hard work at places like the National Sports Institute, Patiala, pays off. Reading about Mary Kom's struggles and subsequent wins is truly motivational. More power to all these athletes. Keep the biographies coming!
